pages.title: Propane
pages.text: A refined gas, extracted from Crude Oil. Propane is stored under pressure and used as an efficient fuel for machines and furnaces.

pages.title: Empty Propane Tank
pages.text: Craft an Empty Propane Tank to store propane. These are later filled using the Filler Machine.

pages.title: Filling Propane Tanks
pages.text: Place an Empty Propane Tank inside the Filler Machine with Propane to create a Filled Propane Tank.
